document.full_text: u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles into a house in pakistan's north waziristan region on friday, killing at least eight suspected militants just as islamists protested against the killing of osama bin laden.
document.title: u.s. drone strike in pakistan; protests over bin laden
lines_and_colors: u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles into a house in pakistan's north waziristan region on friday, killing at least eight suspected militants just as islamists protested against the killing of osama bin laden.
